title: Account reset to level 1!!?!?
body: I recently logged into my level 40 (Silver 4) account and found that I had to pick a new summoner name. As confused as I was, I went ahead and changed the name. After doing so, it asked mt to play tutorials and such, as a new account would have to. After clicking skip on all of them, I find that my account was reset to level 1. All the time and money I have put into this game has now gone to waste. I would like some kind of explaination as to what could have caused my account to suffer this kind of punishment

replies.body:
It honestly sounds like you might be logging into an incorrect account.  Hit up our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we can help get you back on the right one.  If something like that actually did happen, we can also investigate and see what happened.

**Update**: Just investigated a bit, and can confirm you're hopping on the wrong account.

So, the OP is my cousin, and he logged in with the same EXACT username and logged back into his lvl 40 S4 acc. we tried the same thing on my pc and got into the level 1 account using the same credentials, idk how that works, but it's wierd. First time I've witnessed something like that. I'll let him know though
I appreciate you helping out your cousin!  I dug into this, and it really does seem like a case of accessing the wrong account.  Sorry for the confusion. :(
I have him on my friend's list. It shows that his level 40 account is still there, but this new account is there as well. what couldve caused something like this?

Nope!  The summoner on your list is spelled differently.  NA is technically not supposed to have special characters, so I highly recommend everyone sticking to normal NA characters to help avoid issues like this.  ><
